sparse.eigenvolvers.java

Class Operator

  • java.lang.Object
    • sparse.eigenvolvers.java.Operator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EigPreconditioner, OperatorPrecDenseCholesky

    public class Operator
extends java.lang.Object
    SEJ Java Operator class.

    SEJ uses the MTJ Java library (matrix-toolkits-java) and Netlib Java (netlib-java) for numerical linear algebra and matrix computations.

    The Operator class provides convenient methods for defining an operator, in a flexible manner, that implements a matrix block vector multiply. A user can implement whatever operation is desired desire by extending this class and overriding operatorAction(no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix).

    Author:
    Rico Argentati

      • getDenseOperatorMatrix

        public no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix getDenseOperatorMatrix()
        Get dense matrix representing operator. Caution: operator must be small to not run out of memory. This is primarily for testing
        Returns:
        dense matrix

      • getTimeOperatorApply

      • operatorAction

        public no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix operatorAction(no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix X)
        This method applies the operator to a dense input matrix and returns a dense matrix. The method operatorAction(no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix) can be overwritten to provide any matrix block vector multiply or any operation desired by the user as long as X is returned.
        Parameters:
        X - matrix
        Returns:
        X matrix
